remarks: This theorem shows a condition that allows us to represent a descriptor with a class expression ` B ` .  (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
riota2f.1 $e |- F/_ x B $.
riota2f.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
riota2f.3 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
riota2f $p |- ( ( B e. A /\ E! x e. A ph ) -> ( ps <-> ( iota_ x e. A ph ) = B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
